info.description: This is the API for Singularity, a tool for large-scale clients with PB-scale data onboarding to Filecoin network.
info.title: Singularity API

post.summary: Initialize the database

post.description: This will drop all tables and recreate them.
post.summary: Reset the database

get.summary: Get detail of a specific chunk

post.description: The dataset is a top level object to distinguish different dataset.
post.summary: Create a new dataset

delete.description: Important! If the dataset is large, this command will take some time to remove all relevant data.
delete.summary: Remove a specific dataset. This will not remove the CAR files.

get.summary: List all pieces for the dataset that are available for deal making

post.summary: Manually register a piece (CAR file) with the dataset for deal making purpose

get.summary: List all wallets of a dataset.

post.summary: Associate a new wallet with a dataset

delete.summary: Remove an associated wallet from a dataset

post.summary: List all deals
Create a new schedule
Pause a specific schedule
Resume a specific schedule
Send a manual deal proposal

get.description: Get metadata for a piece for how it may be reassembled from the data source

get.summary: List all sources for a dataset

patch.summary: Update the config options of a source

post.summary: Check the connection of the data source by listing a path

get.summary: Get all dag details of a data source

post.summary: Mark a source as ready for DAG generation

get.summary: Get all item details of a data source
Get all item details inside a data source path

post.description: Tells Singularity that something is ready to be grabbed for data preparation

Trigger a rescan of a data source

get.summary: Get the data preparation summary of a data source

Add a remote wallet

filePath.description: Path to the CAR file, used to determine the size of the file and root CID

rootCid.description: Root CID of the CAR file, if not provided, will be determined by the CAR file header. Used to populate the label field of storage deal

encryptionRecipients.description: Public key of the encryption recipient

encryptionScript.description: EncryptionScript command to run for custom encryption

maxSize.description: Maximum size of the CAR files to be created

name.description: Name must be a unique identifier for a dataset

outputDirs.description: Output directory for CAR files. Do not set if using inline preparation

pieceSize.description: Target piece size of the CAR files used for piece commitment calculation

encryptionRecipients.description: Public key of the encryption recipient

encryptionScript.description: EncryptionScript command to run for custom encryption

maxSize.description: Maximum size of the CAR files to be created

outputDirs.description: Output directory for CAR files. Do not set if using inline preparation

pieceSize.description: Target piece size of the CAR files used for piece commitment calculation

deleteAfterExport.description: Delete the source after exporting to CAR files

rescanInterval.description: Automatically rescan the source directory when this interval has passed from last successful scan

sourcePath.description: The path of the source to scan items

templinkThreshold.description: Files >= this size will be downloaded via their tempLink.

token.description: OAuth Access Token as a JSON blob.

uploadWaitPerGb.description: Additional time per GiB to wait after a failed complete upload to see if it appears.

acdTemplinkThreshold.description: Files >= this size will be downloaded via their tempLink.

acdToken.description: OAuth Access Token as a JSON blob.

acdUploadWaitPerGb.description: Additional time per GiB to wait after a failed complete upload to see if it appears.

azureblobAccessTier.description: Access tier of blob: hot, cool or archive.

azureblobArchiveTierDelete.description: Delete archive tier blobs before overwriting.

azureblobClientCertificatePath.description: Path to a PEM or PKCS12 certificate file including the private key.

azureblobClientId.description: The ID of the client in use.

azureblobClientSecret.description: One of the service principal's client secrets

azureblobClientSendCertificateChain.description: Send the certificate chain when using certificate auth.

azureblobDisableChecksum.description: Don't store MD5 checksum with object metadata.

azureblobEnvAuth.description: Read credentials from runtime (environment variables, CLI or MSI).

azureblobMemoryPoolFlushTime.description: How often internal memory buffer pools will be flushed.

azureblobMemoryPoolUseMmap.description: Whether to use mmap buffers in internal memory pool.

azureblobMsiClientId.description: Object ID of the user-assigned MSI to use, if any.

azureblobMsiMiResId.description: Azure resource ID of the user-assigned MSI to use, if any.

azureblobMsiObjectId.description: Object ID of the user-assigned MSI to use, if any.

azureblobNoCheckContainer.description: If set, don't attempt to check the container exists or create it.

azureblobNoHeadObject.description: If set, do not do HEAD before GET when getting objects.

azureblobPublicAccess.description: Public access level of a container: blob or container.

azureblobSasUrl.description: SAS URL for container level access only.

azureblobServicePrincipalFile.description: Path to file containing credentials for use with a service principal.

azureblobTenant.description: ID of the service principal's tenant. Also called its directory ID.

azureblobUploadCutoff.description: Cutoff for switching to chunked upload (<= 256 MiB) (deprecated).

azureblobUseEmulator.description: Uses local storage emulator if provided as 'true'.

azureblobUseMsi.description: Use a managed service identity to authenticate (only works in Azure).

b2Account.description: Account ID or Application Key ID.

b2CopyCutoff.description: Cutoff for switching to multipart copy.

b2DisableChecksum.description: Disable checksums for large (> upload cutoff) files.

b2DownloadAuthDuration.description: Time before the authorization token will expire in s or suffix ms|s|m|h|d.

b2HardDelete.description: Permanently delete files on remote removal, otherwise hide files.

b2MemoryPoolFlushTime.description: How often internal memory buffer pools will be flushed.

b2MemoryPoolUseMmap.description: Whether to use mmap buffers in internal memory pool.

b2TestMode.description: A flag string for X-Bz-Test-Mode header for debugging.

b2UploadCutoff.description: Cutoff for switching to chunked upload.

b2VersionAt.description: Show file versions as they were at the specified time.

b2Versions.description: Include old versions in directory listings.

boxCommitRetries.description: Max number of times to try committing a multipart file.

boxOwnedBy.description: Only show items owned by the login (email address) passed in.

boxRootFolderId.description: Fill in for rclone to use a non root folder as its starting point.

boxToken.description: OAuth Access Token as a JSON blob.

boxUploadCutoff.description: Cutoff for switching to multipart upload (>= 50 MiB).

deleteAfterExport.description: Delete the source after exporting to CAR files

driveAcknowledgeAbuse.description: Set to allow files which return cannotDownloadAbusiveFile to be downloaded.

driveAllowImportNameChange.description: Allow the filetype to change when uploading Google docs.

driveAuthOwnerOnly.description: Only consider files owned by the authenticated user.

driveCopyShortcutContent.description: Server side copy contents of shortcuts instead of the shortcut.

driveExportFormats.description: Comma separated list of preferred formats for downloading Google docs.

driveImpersonate.description: Impersonate this user when using a service account.

driveImportFormats.description: Comma separated list of preferred formats for uploading Google docs.

driveKeepRevisionForever.description: Keep new head revision of each file forever.

driveListChunk.description: Size of listing chunk 100-1000, 0 to disable.

drivePacerBurst.description: Number of API calls to allow without sleeping.

drivePacerMinSleep.description: Minimum time to sleep between API calls.

driveResourceKey.description: Resource key for accessing a link-shared file.

driveScope.description: Scope that rclone should use when requesting access from drive.

driveServerSideAcrossConfigs.description: Allow server-side operations (e.g. copy) to work across different drive configs.

driveServiceAccountFile.description: Service Account Credentials JSON file path.

driveSharedWithMe.description: Only show files that are shared with me.

driveSizeAsQuota.description: Show sizes as storage quota usage, not actual size.

driveSkipChecksumGphotos.description: Skip MD5 checksum on Google photos and videos only.

driveSkipDanglingShortcuts.description: If set skip dangling shortcut files.

driveSkipGdocs.description: Skip google documents in all listings.

driveStarredOnly.description: Only show files that are starred.

driveStopOnDownloadLimit.description: Make download limit errors be fatal.

driveStopOnUploadLimit.description: Make upload limit errors be fatal.

driveTeamDrive.description: ID of the Shared Drive (Team Drive).

driveToken.description: OAuth Access Token as a JSON blob.

driveTrashedOnly.description: Only show files that are in the trash.

driveUploadCutoff.description: Cutoff for switching to chunked upload.

driveUseCreatedDate.description: Use file created date instead of modified date.

driveUseSharedDate.description: Use date file was shared instead of modified date.

driveUseTrash.description: Send files to the trash instead of deleting permanently.

driveV2DownloadMinSize.description: If Object's are greater, use drive v2 API to download.

dropboxBatchCommitTimeout.description: Max time to wait for a batch to finish committing

dropboxBatchSize.description: Max number of files in upload batch.

dropboxBatchTimeout.description: Max time to allow an idle upload batch before uploading.

dropboxImpersonate.description: Impersonate this user when using a business account.

dropboxSharedFiles.description: Instructs rclone to work on individual shared files.

dropboxSharedFolders.description: Instructs rclone to work on shared folders.

dropboxToken.description: OAuth Access Token as a JSON blob.

fichierApiKey.description: Your API Key, get it from https://1fichier.com/console/params.pl.

fichierFilePassword.description: If you want to download a shared file that is password protected, add this parameter.

fichierFolderPassword.description: If you want to list the files in a shared folder that is password protected, add this parameter.

fichierSharedFolder.description: If you want to download a shared folder, add this parameter.

filefabricUrl.description: URL of the Enterprise File Fabric to connect to.

filefabricVersion.description: Version read from the file fabric.

ftpAskPassword.description: Allow asking for FTP password when needed.

ftpCloseTimeout.description: Maximum time to wait for a response to close.

ftpConcurrency.description: Maximum number of FTP simultaneous connections, 0 for unlimited.

ftpDisableEpsv.description: Disable using EPSV even if server advertises support.

ftpDisableMlsd.description: Disable using MLSD even if server advertises support.

ftpDisableTls13.description: Disable TLS 1.3 (workaround for FTP servers with buggy TLS)

ftpDisableUtf8.description: Disable using UTF-8 even if server advertises support.

ftpForceListHidden.description: Use LIST -a to force listing of hidden files and folders. This will disable the use of MLSD.

ftpIdleTimeout.description: Max time before closing idle connections.

ftpNoCheckCertificate.description: Do not verify the TLS certificate of the server.

ftpShutTimeout.description: Maximum time to wait for data connection closing status.

ftpTlsCacheSize.description: Size of TLS session cache for all control and data connections.

ftpWritingMdtm.description: Use MDTM to set modification time (VsFtpd quirk)

gcsAnonymous.description: Access public buckets and objects without credentials.

gcsBucketAcl.description: Access Control List for new buckets.

gcsBucketPolicyOnly.description: Access checks should use bucket-level IAM policies.

gcsDecompress.description: If set this will decompress gzip encoded objects.

gcsEnvAuth.description: Get GCP IAM credentials from runtime (environment variables or instance meta data if no env vars).

gcsLocation.description: Location for the newly created buckets.

gcsNoCheckBucket.description: If set, don't attempt to check the bucket exists or create it.

gcsObjectAcl.description: Access Control List for new objects.

gcsServiceAccountFile.description: Service Account Credentials JSON file path.

gcsStorageClass.description: The storage class to use when storing objects in Google Cloud Storage.

gcsToken.description: OAuth Access Token as a JSON blob.

gphotosIncludeArchived.description: Also view and download archived media.

gphotosReadOnly.description: Set to make the Google Photos backend read only.

gphotosReadSize.description: Set to read the size of media items.

gphotosStartYear.description: Year limits the photos to be downloaded to those which are uploaded after the given year.

gphotosToken.description: OAuth Access Token as a JSON blob.

hdfsServicePrincipalName.description: Kerberos service principal name for the namenode.

hidriveDisableFetchingMemberCount.description: Do not fetch number of objects in directories unless it is absolutely necessary.

hidriveRootPrefix.description: The root/parent folder for all paths.

hidriveScopeAccess.description: Access permissions that rclone should use when requesting access from HiDrive.

hidriveScopeRole.description: User-level that rclone should use when requesting access from HiDrive.

hidriveToken.description: OAuth Access Token as a JSON blob.

httpHeaders.description: Set HTTP headers for all transactions.

httpNoSlash.description: Set this if the site doesn't end directories with /.

httpUrl.description: URL of HTTP host to connect to.

internetarchiveDisableChecksum.description: Don't ask the server to test against MD5 checksum calculated by rclone.

internetarchiveWaitArchive.description: Timeout for waiting the server's processing tasks (specifically archive and book_op) to finish.

jottacloudHardDelete.description: Delete files permanently rather than putting them into the trash.

jottacloudMd5MemoryLimit.description: Files bigger than this will be cached on disk to calculate the MD5 if required.

jottacloudNoVersions.description: Avoid server side versioning by deleting files and recreating files instead of overwriting them.

jottacloudTrashedOnly.description: Only show files that are in the trash.

jottacloudUploadResumeLimit.description: Files bigger than this can be resumed if the upload fail's.

koofrEndpoint.description: The Koofr API endpoint to use.

koofrMountid.description: Mount ID of the mount to use.

koofrPassword.description: Your password for rclone (generate one at https://app.koofr.net/app/admin/preferences/password).

koofrSetmtime.description: Does the backend support setting modification time.

localCaseInsensitive.description: Force the filesystem to report itself as case insensitive.

localCaseSensitive.description: Force the filesystem to report itself as case sensitive.

localCopyLinks.description: Follow symlinks and copy the pointed to item.

localLinks.description: Translate symlinks to/from regular files with a '.rclonelink' extension.

localNoCheckUpdated.description: Don't check to see if the files change during upload.

localNoPreallocate.description: Disable preallocation of disk space for transferred files.

localNoSparse.description: Disable sparse files for multi-thread downloads.

localNounc.description: Disable UNC (long path names) conversion on Windows.

localUnicodeNormalization.description: Apply unicode NFC normalization to paths and filenames.

localZeroSizeLinks.description: Assume the Stat size of links is zero (and read them instead) (deprecated).

mailruCheckHash.description: What should copy do if file checksum is mismatched or invalid.

mailruQuirks.description: Comma separated list of internal maintenance flags.

mailruSpeedupEnable.description: Skip full upload if there is another file with same data hash.

mailruSpeedupFilePatterns.description: Comma separated list of file name patterns eligible for speedup (put by hash).

mailruSpeedupMaxDisk.description: This option allows you to disable speedup (put by hash) for large files.

mailruSpeedupMaxMemory.description: Files larger than the size given below will always be hashed on disk.

mailruUserAgent.description: HTTP user agent used internally by client.

megaHardDelete.description: Delete files permanently rather than putting them into the trash.

netstorageHost.description: Domain+path of NetStorage host to connect to.

netstorageProtocol.description: Select between HTTP or HTTPS protocol.

netstorageSecret.description: Set the NetStorage account secret/G2O key for authentication.

onedriveAccessScopes.description: Set scopes to be requested by rclone.
onedriveAccessScopes.default: Files.Read Files.ReadWrite Files.Read.All Files.ReadWrite.All Sites.Read.All offline_access

onedriveChunkSize.description: Chunk size to upload files with - must be multiple of 320k (327,680 bytes).

onedriveDisableSitePermission.description: Disable the request for Sites.Read.All permission.

onedriveDriveId.description: The ID of the drive to use.

onedriveDriveType.description: The type of the drive (personal | business | documentLibrary).

onedriveExposeOnenoteFiles.description: Set to make OneNote files show up in directory listings.

onedriveHashType.description: Specify the hash in use for the backend.

onedriveLinkPassword.description: Set the password for links created by the link command.

onedriveLinkScope.description: Set the scope of the links created by the link command.

onedriveLinkType.description: Set the type of the links created by the link command.

onedriveNoVersions.description: Remove all versions on modifying operations.

onedriveRegion.description: Choose national cloud region for OneDrive.

onedriveServerSideAcrossConfigs.description: Allow server-side operations (e.g. copy) to work across different onedrive configs.

onedriveToken.description: OAuth Access Token as a JSON blob.

oosChunkSize.description: Chunk size to use for uploading.

oosConfigProfile.description: Profile name inside the oci config file

oosCopyCutoff.description: Cutoff for switching to multipart copy.

oosDisableChecksum.description: Don't store MD5 checksum with object metadata.

oosLeavePartsOnError.description: If true avoid calling abort upload on a failure, leaving all successfully uploaded parts on S3 for manual recovery.

oosNoCheckBucket.description: If set, don't attempt to check the bucket exists or create it.

oosSseCustomerAlgorithm.description: If using SSE-C, the optional header that specifies "AES256" as the encryption algorithm.

oosSseCustomerKey.description: To use SSE-C, the optional header that specifies the base64-encoded 256-bit encryption key to use to

oosSseCustomerKeyFile.description: To use SSE-C, a file containing the base64-encoded string of the AES-256 encryption key associated

oosSseCustomerKeySha256.description: If using SSE-C, The optional header that specifies the base64-encoded SHA256 hash of the encryption

oosSseKmsKeyId.description: if using using your own master key in vault, this header specifies the

oosStorageTier.description: The storage class to use when storing new objects in storage. https://docs.oracle.com/en-us/iaas/Content/Object/Concepts/understandingstoragetiers.htm

oosUploadCutoff.description: Cutoff for switching to chunked upload.

opendriveChunkSize.description: Files will be uploaded in chunks this size.

pcloudRootFolderId.description: Fill in for rclone to use a non root folder as its starting point.

pcloudToken.description: OAuth Access Token as a JSON blob.

qingstorChunkSize.description: Chunk size to use for uploading.

qingstorEndpoint.description: Enter an endpoint URL to connection QingStor API.

qingstorUploadCutoff.description: Cutoff for switching to chunked upload.

rescanInterval.description: Automatically rescan the source directory when this interval has passed from last successful scan

s3Acl.description: Canned ACL used when creating buckets and storing or copying objects.

s3BucketAcl.description: Canned ACL used when creating buckets.

s3ChunkSize.description: Chunk size to use for uploading.

s3CopyCutoff.description: Cutoff for switching to multipart copy.

s3Decompress.description: If set this will decompress gzip encoded objects.

s3DisableChecksum.description: Don't store MD5 checksum with object metadata.

s3DisableHttp2.description: Disable usage of http2 for S3 backends.

s3EnvAuth.description: Get AWS credentials from runtime (environment variables or EC2/ECS meta data if no env vars).

s3ForcePathStyle.description: If true use path style access if false use virtual hosted style.

s3LeavePartsOnError.description: If true avoid calling abort upload on a failure, leaving all successfully uploaded parts on S3 for manual recovery.

s3ListChunk.description: Size of listing chunk (response list for each ListObject S3 request).

s3ListUrlEncode.description: Whether to url encode listings: true/false/unset

s3ListVersion.description: Version of ListObjects to use: 1,2 or 0 for auto.

s3LocationConstraint.description: Location constraint - must be set to match the Region.

s3MaxUploadParts.description: Maximum number of parts in a multipart upload.

s3MemoryPoolFlushTime.description: How often internal memory buffer pools will be flushed.

s3MemoryPoolUseMmap.description: Whether to use mmap buffers in internal memory pool.

s3MightGzip.description: Set this if the backend might gzip objects.

s3NoCheckBucket.description: If set, don't attempt to check the bucket exists or create it.

s3NoHead.description: If set, don't HEAD uploaded objects to check integrity.

s3NoHeadObject.description: If set, do not do HEAD before GET when getting objects.

s3NoSystemMetadata.description: Suppress setting and reading of system metadata

s3Profile.description: Profile to use in the shared credentials file.

s3RequesterPays.description: Enables requester pays option when interacting with S3 bucket.

s3ServerSideEncryption.description: The server-side encryption algorithm used when storing this object in S3.

s3SharedCredentialsFile.description: Path to the shared credentials file.

s3SseCustomerAlgorithm.description: If using SSE-C, the server-side encryption algorithm used when storing this object in S3.

s3SseCustomerKey.description: To use SSE-C you may provide the secret encryption key used to encrypt/decrypt your data.

s3SseCustomerKeyBase64.description: If using SSE-C you must provide the secret encryption key encoded in base64 format to encrypt/decrypt your data.

s3SseCustomerKeyMd5.description: If using SSE-C you may provide the secret encryption key MD5 checksum (optional).

s3SseKmsKeyId.description: If using KMS ID you must provide the ARN of Key.

s3StorageClass.description: The storage class to use when storing new objects in S3.

s3UploadCutoff.description: Cutoff for switching to chunked upload.

s3UseAccelerateEndpoint.description: If true use the AWS S3 accelerated endpoint.

s3UseMultipartEtag.description: Whether to use ETag in multipart uploads for verification

s3UsePresignedRequest.description: Whether to use a presigned request or PutObject for single part uploads

s3VersionAt.description: Show file versions as they were at the specified time.

s3Versions.description: Include old versions in directory listings.

seafile2fa.description: Two-factor authentication ('true' if the account has 2FA enabled).

seafileCreateLibrary.description: Should rclone create a library if it doesn't exist.

seafileUrl.description: URL of seafile host to connect to.

sftpAskPassword.description: Allow asking for SFTP password when needed.

sftpCiphers.description: Space separated list of ciphers to be used for session encryption, ordered by preference.

sftpConcurrency.description: The maximum number of outstanding requests for one file

sftpDisableConcurrentReads.description: If set don't use concurrent reads.

sftpDisableConcurrentWrites.description: If set don't use concurrent writes.

sftpDisableHashcheck.description: Disable the execution of SSH commands to determine if remote file hashing is available.

sftpIdleTimeout.description: Max time before closing idle connections.

sftpKeyExchange.description: Space separated list of key exchange algorithms, ordered by preference.

sftpKeyFile.description: Path to PEM-encoded private key file.

sftpKeyFilePass.description: The passphrase to decrypt the PEM-encoded private key file.

sftpKeyUseAgent.description: When set forces the usage of the ssh-agent.

sftpMacs.description: Space separated list of MACs (message authentication code) algorithms, ordered by preference.

sftpMd5sumCommand.description: The command used to read md5 hashes.

sftpPass.description: SSH password, leave blank to use ssh-agent.

sftpPathOverride.description: Override path used by SSH shell commands.

sftpPubkeyFile.description: Optional path to public key file.

sftpServerCommand.description: Specifies the path or command to run a sftp server on the remote host.

sftpSetEnv.description: Environment variables to pass to sftp and commands

sftpSetModtime.description: Set the modified time on the remote if set.

sftpSha1sumCommand.description: The command used to read sha1 hashes.

sftpShellType.description: The type of SSH shell on remote server, if any.

sftpSkipLinks.description: Set to skip any symlinks and any other non regular files.

sftpSubsystem.description: Specifies the SSH2 subsystem on the remote host.

sftpUseFstat.description: If set use fstat instead of stat.

sftpUseInsecureCipher.description: Enable the use of insecure ciphers and key exchange methods.

sharefileUploadCutoff.description: Cutoff for switching to multipart upload.

siaApiUrl.description: Sia daemon API URL, like http://sia.daemon.host:9980.

smbCaseInsensitive.description: Whether the server is configured to be case-insensitive.

smbHideSpecialShare.description: Hide special shares (e.g. print$) which users aren't supposed to access.

smbHost.description: SMB server hostname to connect to.

smbIdleTimeout.description: Max time before closing idle connections.

swiftAuthToken.description: Auth Token from alternate authentication - optional (OS_AUTH_TOKEN).

swiftAuthVersion.description: AuthVersion - optional - set to (1,2,3) if your auth URL has no version (ST_AUTH_VERSION).

swiftChunkSize.description: Above this size files will be chunked into a _segments container.

swiftEndpointType.description: Endpoint type to choose from the service catalogue (OS_ENDPOINT_TYPE).

swiftEnvAuth.description: Get swift credentials from environment variables in standard OpenStack form.

swiftLeavePartsOnError.description: If true avoid calling abort upload on a failure.

swiftNoChunk.description: Don't chunk files during streaming upload.

swiftNoLargeObjects.description: Disable support for static and dynamic large objects

swiftStoragePolicy.description: The storage policy to use when creating a new container.

swiftTenant.description: Tenant name - optional for v1 auth, this or tenant_id required otherwise (OS_TENANT_NAME or OS_PROJECT_NAME).

swiftTenantId.description: Tenant ID - optional for v1 auth, this or tenant required otherwise (OS_TENANT_ID).

swiftUserId.description: User ID to log in - optional - most swift systems use user and leave this blank (v3 auth) (OS_USER_ID).

webdavBearerToken.description: Bearer token instead of user/pass (e.g. a Macaroon).

webdavBearerTokenCommand.description: Command to run to get a bearer token.

webdavHeaders.description: Set HTTP headers for all transactions.

webdavUrl.description: URL of http host to connect to.

webdavVendor.description: Name of the WebDAV site/service/software you are using.

yandexHardDelete.description: Delete files permanently rather than putting them into the trash.

yandexToken.description: OAuth Access Token as a JSON blob.

zohoToken.description: OAuth Access Token as a JSON blob.

accessTier.description: Access tier of blob: hot, cool or archive.

archiveTierDelete.description: Delete archive tier blobs before overwriting.

clientCertificatePath.description: Path to a PEM or PKCS12 certificate file including the private key.

clientId.description: The ID of the client in use.

clientSecret.description: One of the service principal's client secrets

clientSendCertificateChain.description: Send the certificate chain when using certificate auth.

deleteAfterExport.description: Delete the source after exporting to CAR files

disableChecksum.description: Don't store MD5 checksum with object metadata.

envAuth.description: Read credentials from runtime (environment variables, CLI or MSI).

memoryPoolFlushTime.description: How often internal memory buffer pools will be flushed.

memoryPoolUseMmap.description: Whether to use mmap buffers in internal memory pool.

msiClientId.description: Object ID of the user-assigned MSI to use, if any.

msiMiResId.description: Azure resource ID of the user-assigned MSI to use, if any.

msiObjectId.description: Object ID of the user-assigned MSI to use, if any.

noCheckContainer.description: If set, don't attempt to check the container exists or create it.

noHeadObject.description: If set, do not do HEAD before GET when getting objects.

publicAccess.description: Public access level of a container: blob or container.

rescanInterval.description: Automatically rescan the source directory when this interval has passed from last successful scan

sasUrl.description: SAS URL for container level access only.

servicePrincipalFile.description: Path to file containing credentials for use with a service principal.

sourcePath.description: The path of the source to scan items

tenant.description: ID of the service principal's tenant. Also called its directory ID.

uploadCutoff.description: Cutoff for switching to chunked upload (<= 256 MiB) (deprecated).

useEmulator.description: Uses local storage emulator if provided as 'true'.

useMsi.description: Use a managed service identity to authenticate (only works in Azure).

account.description: Account ID or Application Key ID.

copyCutoff.description: Cutoff for switching to multipart copy.

deleteAfterExport.description: Delete the source after exporting to CAR files

disableChecksum.description: Disable checksums for large (> upload cutoff) files.

downloadAuthDuration.description: Time before the authorization token will expire in s or suffix ms|s|m|h|d.

hardDelete.description: Permanently delete files on remote removal, otherwise hide files.

memoryPoolFlushTime.description: How often internal memory buffer pools will be flushed.

memoryPoolUseMmap.description: Whether to use mmap buffers in internal memory pool.
